# buildkit Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **buildkit_url** (String) URL for a running buildkit daemon.

- **registry_auth** (Block Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--registry_auth))
